C

Code - Class in utils
The Code class defines constants for various status codes used in a Connect4 game API.

Connect4 - Class in game
Connect4 class represents the logic for the Connect4 game.

Initializes a new Connect4 game with the given mode.

Initializes a Connect4 game with two given players

Initializes a Connect4 game with given game mode and two players
CONT_GAME - Static variable in class utils.Code
Status code indicating the game is still ongoing and no player has won yet.

F

FULL_COL_ERR - Static variable in class utils.Code

G

game - package game
 
GAME_FIN_ERR - Static variable in class utils.Code
Error code indicating an action was attempted on a finished game (e.g., trying to drop a piece after the game is over).

Response<T> - Class in utils
The Response class encapsulates a standardized response structure for the Connect4 game API, including a status code and optional data.

Constructs a Response object with the specified status code and data.
